definitions.definition: A copper plate , either etched or engraved , to make a recessed pattern .
A print made from such a plate.
A style of handwriting based on that used on such prints; English round hand .

main_definition: A copper plate , either etched or engraved , to make a recessed pattern .
secondary_definitions: A print made from such a plate.
A style of handwriting based on that used on such prints; English round hand .
